Today in County Clare, Lahinch Beach and surrounding spots are lighting up with a solid 4 ft @ 9s W swell and light 8 mph WNW winds. Expect clean conditions throughout the day, especially from 09:26 to 17:25. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 8s W with fresh 13 mph S winds, making it a bit choppy but still surfable. By the day after, we're looking at a significant jump to 10 ft @ 14s W, with winds easing to 11 mph S, offering some epic surf at spots like Lahinch and Doolin Point. Best: today.
